resources.string:
Features 
 1. Multiple selection of crops for search. 
 you can select multiple crops from the combo box and remove them from selection by clicking on the name on selected crops box
 2 Multiple selection of crops for search. 
 you can select multiple locations from the combo box and remove them from selection by clicking on the name on selected locations box
 3.You can do multiple selection of crops, locations and price range at the same time
 4.Scroll the list of results if you can not see them all
